description: David told us he could get out of any bondage we put him in. We'll he was half right. He got his legs out in no time, but luckily Sebastian wasn't stingy with the tape around his wrists . . . or over his mouth. He lost the bet but he still won the prize. Sebastian worked him over like we hadn't seen before. It was a good job David had a high pain threshold as Sebastian wasn't holding back. And we could feel each swat from behind the cameras!
title: David Dixx & Sebastian Kane
